title: 820-00165 Shorted P1V05VTBT_SW
message: Any suggestions for disabling U2800? It's heating up to about 200F (close to 100C). I would rather not have to remove it so I was hoping there was a way to cut power to it. The short is inside U2800. I've removed components to isolate it down to that.

title: 820-00165 Shorted P1V05VTBT_SW
message: Nope, you will have to pull it.
